00021 class IconState {
00022     public:
00024         enum Size {
00026             DefaultSize = 1,
00028             SmallSize = 2,
00030             LargeSize = 4
00031         };
00032 
00034         enum Mode {
00036             NormalMode = 8,
00038             DisabledMode = 16,
00040             ActiveMode = 32
00041         };
00042 
00045         IconState(Size size = DefaultSize, Mode mode = NormalMode);
00046 
00048         void SetSize(Size size);
00049 
00051         Size GetSize() const;
00052 
00054         void SetMode(Mode mode);
00055 
00057         Mode GetMode() const; 
00058 
00060         BOOLEAN operator==(const IconState& state) const { return m_state == state.m_state; }
00061 
00063         BOOLEAN operator!=(const IconState& state) const { return m_state != state.m_state; }
00064 
00065     private:
00066         UINT8 m_state;
00067 };
